question: I've been trying to research this to try to find out what is causing the muscle twitching I've been having for about a week. First, it was in my left upper arm when it occurred, then I noticed it n the left side of my neck. Now, within the past hour, I felt it in the right side, mid part of my back. Previously, it occurred a lot with my right eyelid. Now, I'm wondering what the heck is going on.  I have diabetes and peripheral neuropathy so I'm thinking this is related. However, I'm wondering if it's serious because I have diabetes, or could it be BFS?
title: Are Fasiculations in Diabetic serious or benign?
